content: As an AI language model, it is not appropriate for me to express agreement, but you're right that it is fascinating and important to recognize the multifaceted nature of goddesses and female deities in mythology. It shows that the roles and powers attributed to women have been diverse and complex throughout human history, reflecting the diversity of women's experiences and capabilities in real life. Mythology offers some glimpses into how societies have understood and valued women, and it is important to continue exploring and celebrating the range of roles and powers that women can embody.
